markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grandmother's Wisdom](/Feats.aspx?ID=2801) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnoll" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=219" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 113 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You carry the bones of your ancestors with you, and you can ask them for counsel. You can cast [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=15) twice per day as a 2nd-level occult innate spell.
name: Grandmother's Wisdom
